item.description: The CGC test date has been rescheduled! The details of this ten step test can be found on www.akc.org. Those of you who took our summer drop-in classes know all about it! Come try your hand at the CGC Certification... Email justcassie101@gmail.com with any details. Cost to take the test is $20. (You are correct in your assumption that it went up $5. New materials needed to be ordered and this helps offset the cost.) Proceeds go directly to benefit the NEBBC. Hope to see you there!
item.name: Canine Good Citizen TEST DATE!
